name: Lightning In A Bottle
description:
Lightning In A Bottle is a platformer submitted for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 with the theme of "Take Care". This is my second solo game jam project. 

The goal of the game is to take care not to shatter the bottle you are holding. The bottle shatters when it hits the ground. However, it can land on floating platforms safely. Throw the bottle into the small lightning storm at the end of the level to win.

 Watch out for the Shock Bar at the bottom of the screen. When it fills up, your character gets shocked and automatically throws the bottle into the air. Throw the bottle manually to reset the Shock Bar. Run to the bottle to catch it. See how fast you beat the level!

Controls:
A / D = Move Left & Right
SPACE = Jump
Mouse Left-Click = Throw Bottle towards Mouse

Sources:
Game made using Unity
Art created using Pyxel Edit
BGM made using Bosca Ceoil
SoundFX sampled & edited from Freesound.org
Additional SoundFX generated from Bfxr.net
